channel.title: Could not find or load main class client [Help Please]
channel.description:
Sup guys, everytime i try to run my client it gives me this: [img]http://puu.sh/4TE8l.jpg[/img]
and this in Eclipse: [img]http://puu.sh/4TDJq.png[/img]
I have searched on here, r-s and google and i can't find anything that helps.. Any idea's?
